description: Secretary of State Antony J. Blinken told the United Nations that the United States believes that Russia plans to attack Ukraine “in the coming days.”
title: Blinken Challenges Russia to Pledge It Will Not Invade Ukraine
title_page: Blinken Challenges Russia to Pledge It Will Not Invade Ukraine - The New York Times
